identified-content.object.title: Frasier (TV Program)
Who Wants to Be A Millionaire (TV Program)
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Media, Entertainment and Publishing

abstract.p: Season finale of ABC television program Frasier scores one of first noteworthy dents in ratings armor of ABC game show hit Who Wants to Be a Millionaire, which trails far behind (S)

block.p: Scoring one of the first noteworthy dents in the ratings armor of the ABC game show hit ''Who Wants to Be a Millionaire,'' NBC's ''Frasier'' won a smashing victory on Thursday night with its hourlong season finale. ''Frasier'' racked up a 22 rating, while ''Millionaire'' trailed far behind with a 12.2. (Each rating point represents just over 1 million homes.)
More painful for ABC is how badly ''Frasier'' beat ''Millionaire'' among young adult viewers, by 16.8 rating points to 5.4.

Scoring one of the first noteworthy dents in the ratings armor of the ABC game show hit ''Who Wants to Be a Millionaire,'' NBC's ''Frasier'' won a smashing victory on Thursday night with its hourlong season finale. ''Frasier'' racked up a 22 rating, while ''Millionaire'' trailed far behind with a 12.2. (Each rating point represents just over 1 million homes.)
More painful for ABC is how badly ''Frasier'' beat ''Millionaire'' among young adult viewers, by 16.8 rating points to 5.4.

ABC also tried to thwart the season finale of ''E.R.'' with a documentary about how ''Millionaire'' is made, and it, too, was thoroughly beaten. ''E.R.'' had a 22.3 rating to just 9.4 for the documentary.
''Frasier'' has proved to be the strongest competitor for ''Millionaire,'' beating it several times in the last month.
But ''Frasier'' is now off for the summer, and ''Millionaire'' will continue with original shows all summer long.
